flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 150 students, 100% - 60% = 20% are boys.
So, there are 150 x 20/100 = <<150*20/100=30>>30 boys.
Out of the 30 boys, 30 x 1/3 = <<30*1/3=10>>10 joined varsity clubs.
Therefore, 30 - 10 = <<30-10=20>>20 boys did not join varsity clubs.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
